title: Paperweight
description: Baccarat bouquet of many colors;  bottom surrounded by blue-white filigree twist; consists of many closely gathered varying colored and shaped set ups gathered in center of weight and tapering to bottom, where it is surrounded by a blue and white filigree twist; on bottom of weight is a star cutting
creditline: Gift of Mrs. C. M. Skinner in memory of her mother, Mrs. Harry Whiting
